articles.title: Tiny three-week-old baby believed to be Scotland's youngest coronavirus patient - Daily Record
articles.description: Little Paton is currently being treated in the maternity unit at University Hospital Wishaw having tested positive for the deadly bug.
articles.content:
A newborn baby is believed to be the youngest person in Scotland to have contracted coronavirus.
